content: For release on delivery  9:30 a.m. EST (4:30 p.m. local time)  November 14, 2013      Brief remarks      by     Ben S. Bernanke     Chairman     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at the     Annual Conference of the Union of Arab Banks      on the Occasion of its 40th Anniversary     Beirut, Lebanon                 November 14, 2013  (via prerecorded video)
